meanings.definition: The act of shaping or carving a material into a desired form.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed sculpting clay into animals.
meanings.sent2: The artist's sculpting of marble was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The sculpting of the cake into a unicorn was a delightful surprise at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like sculpting the emotions of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sculpting of the sandcastle brought joy to the children at the beach.

meanings.definition: The art or practice of creating sculptures.
meanings.sent1: His passion for sculpting led him to create beautiful statues.
meanings.sent2: The museum featured a special exhibit on ancient sculpting techniques.
meanings.sent3: The sculpting of the ice cream into a flower shape was a creative touch.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a sculpting effect on the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sculpting of the tree branches against the sky was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The process of creating three-dimensional artwork.
meanings.sent1: The sculpting of the clay resulted in a stunning vase.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the history of sculpting was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The sculpting of the clouds into animal shapes was a fun game on a lazy afternoon.
meanings.sent4: His laughter filled the room, sculpting a joyful mood for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The sculpting of the mountains by the wind over centuries was a marvel of nature.
